front.title: Address Resolution for Instant Messaging and Presence

abstract.t: Presence and instant messaging are defined in RFC2778 [5]. The Common Profiles for Presence [2] and Instant Messaging [1] define two URI schemes: 'im' for INSTANT INBOXes and 'pres' for PRESENTITIES. This document provides guidance for locating the resources associated with URIs that employ these schemes.
